title: 10/13/21 DPS Hour 2 Frank Isola
itunes:title: 10/13/21 DPS Hour 2 Frank Isola
description:
Frank Isola talks to Dan about the Nets and the issues they have with Kyrie Irving. Frank says that Kevin Durant is not very happy right now because he loves to play basketball.
